original: Leon, Karl Oskar, kapten, Göteborg, f. 21/10/73 i Lundby, Gbg. G. 29 m. Annie Drexler. — Styrmansex. 92, sjökapt:ex. 94, reservoff :ex. 95, na-vig iskoleförest :ex. 97, spec:elev v. KTH 97-00, flottans minskola 00-01, KSHS 04-06. Und :löjtn. i flottans res. 95, löjtn. v. flottan CO, v. kustart. 01, kapt. 03-07. Vist. utomlands o. i Sv:e i o. f. exploatering av vissa mil. uppfinn. samt antifriktionslager 07-29, konsult, tekniker h. SKF i Gbg 30-40. Skr.: The Leon Torpedo and Subma-rine Mine.
translated: Leon, Karl Oskar, captain, Gothenburg, b. 21/10/73 in Lundby, Gbg. m. 29 to Annie Drexler. — Second mate exam 92, master mariner exam 94, reserve officer exam 95, naval navigation school director exam 97, special student at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) 97-00, navy mine school 00-01, KSHS (Naval Staff College) 04-06. Lieutenant in the navy reserve 95, lieutenant in the navy CO, coastal artillery 01, captain 03-07. Resided abroad and in Sweden for the development and exploitation of certain military inventions and anti-friction bearings 07-29, consultant, technician at SKF in Gothenburg 30-40. Wrote: The Leon Torpedo and Submarine Mine.

worksWritten.name: The Leon Torpedo and Submarine Mine
